text:
Hi all. I have a function in which I create an array but the type of the array is selected by the user meaning that it is passed as an argument something like:
```function f(T)
    arr = Matrix{T}(undef,3,3)
    return arr
end```
What is a correct type-stable way to do this? This is basically the function to load a bunch of data into named tuples with pre-specified types for each tuple element (I cannot use DataFrames).

elements.text: Hi all. I have a function in which I create an array but the type of the array is selected by the user meaning that it is passed as an argument something like:

What is a correct type-stable way to do this? This is basically the function to load a bunch of data into named tuples with pre-specified types for each tuple element (I cannot use DataFrames).
